entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to scroll carouselview inside of a tabbed page #18490
  • App with a Page derived from Multipage<page> throws an error #18489
  • iOS: Editor wrapped in border cuts off text if scroll bar is needed. NET8 RC2 #18486
  • iPad FlyoutPage Master width is half the screen #18485
  • Android: Certain span sizes create unwanted vertical shift in label #18482
  • Using CollectionView IsGrouped="True" bound to ObservableCollection causes crash #18481
  • Android underlined label shows 'space' at linebreak #18480
  • MAUI NET 8 RC-2 : CollectionView and ListView items missing or wrong #18479
  • TapGestureRecognizer on Span does not work on Windows #18478
    Backlog
  • Need the abiltiy to Activate a window from within the program #18477
  • There is a lot of space between each data when nested collection view is implemented in .NET MAUI in iOS #18476
  • Maui Popup Randomly Disrupts the Transitional View #18474

Closed

  • [Android,iOS] Real device crash on navigation #18372
  • Windows: CollectionView is flickering when an item is moved #17369
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Padding not applied to AbsoluteLayout within ScrollView when navigating through app shell. #14797
  • FlyoutContent is blank on iOS #18475
  • [regression/8.0.0] Entry ignores TextColor on iOS #17843
    .NET 8 SR1
  • CommunityToolkit.Maui.Views.Popup Button Text Alignment #18195
  • Accessing string resource throws a false FileNotFoundException in Android #18225
    Backlog
  • How can I run my Maui projects with the Maui source code fully open to me in Visual Studio so I can test/solve bugs I find in the Maui code? #18270

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the versions to the ProjectCapabilities #18494
  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Fix the incorrect manifest project name #18488
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using RotateYTo and RotateXTo #18484
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18472
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Bump version to generate 8.0.1.x versioning #18491
  • Update main to the latest public versions #18487
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Ignore use of obsolete iOS/Catalyst API until we update to iOS bump with new APIs #18468
  • Update release branch versions #18473

Updated

  • Force ShapeHandler to exist when adding shape to border #18076
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache #18464
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Fixed null coalesce issues #17920
    s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Try a new Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Maui SDK #14640
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Fixed Path size calculations #17722
    area/drawing ✏️, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers and cleanup #18449
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, memory-leak 💦
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Removes freeze using SecureStorage #17928
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 SR1
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Backport #16762 - [windows] fix memory leak in ListView #18463
    area/ListView
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞, stale, Under Consideration
  • fix 18457 #18458
    community ✨
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1
